comments: In STAG the userâ€™s data is compared to the database of previously genotyped samples and generates a report of genet identification.
quotas: Requires a login. Anyone can create a login.
citations: Kitchen, S. A., Kuster, G. V., Kuntz, K. L. V., Reich, H. G., Miller, W., Griffin, S., Fogarty, N. D., & Baums, I. B. (2020).
